screenshot.caption: ZMBX file open in Mecabricks

description: Mecabricks allows you to build, render, and animate LEGO creations. When creating your 3D scene, you can choose from various bricks, colors, backgrounds, lighting, and other effects.

When saving a scene as a ZMBX file, Mecabricks stores all of this information in the file. To export a scene from Mecabricks, select File â†’ Export... , and then choose Blender Add-on from the format options.
